title: How does one buy Omega Squad Veigar bundle?
body:
I canno't seem to find it in the store.
The other single-skin bundles seem to be absent as well.

I know they are covert ops... but still.

replies.body:
Should be under skins --> chroma if you are looking for the Chroma bundle.

https://i.gyazo.com/0dcd3ecd8d9eb86eba946de5f5e046d1.png

Oh mb, i thought they were in the bundles section. 

http://imgur.com/a/ry2wD

http://imgur.com/a/rooC0

Cos they look like big bundles. 

thanks haha
No worries, yeah I think they are under chromas cause they are mainly chromas (when we talk about the individual skin). The big bundles (like all omega squad skins) are under bundles.

Ahhh ok I see, I just assumed, mb.

Veigar and all his chromas are now mine to wreak havoc on the rift with >:D
